parameters.name: BR
parameters.description: Bartels rotation number.

parameters.name: ProFlux
parameters.description: Proton differential flux, at 45 bins 0.433-59.37 GeV/n.

parameters.name: ProFlux_TotErr
parameters.description: Proton flux total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProFlux_StatErr
parameters.description: Proton flux statistical error.

parameters.name: ProFlux_TimeErr
parameters.description: Proton fluxtime-dependent error: trigger and reconstruction efficiency errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProFlux_SystErr
parameters.description: Proton Flux systematic error: acceptance, background contamination, geomagnetic cutoff, event selection, rigidity resolution, unfolding, absolute rigidity scale and time-dependent errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: HeFlux
parameters.description: Helium differential flux, at 40 bins 0.404-29.23 GeV/n.

parameters.name: HeFlux_TotErr
parameters.description: Helium flux total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: HeFlux_StatErr
parameters.description: Helium flux statistical error.

parameters.name: HeFlux_TimeErr
parameters.description: Helium flux time-dependent error: trigger and reconstruction efficiency errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: HeFlux_SystErr
parameters.description: Helium flux systematic error: acceptance, background contamination, geomagnetic cutoff, event selection, rigidity resolution, unfolding, absolute rigidity scale and time-dependent errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProHeRatio
parameters.description: Proton to Helium differential flux ratio, at 40 bins 1.92-60.30 GV.

parameters.name: ProHeRatio_TotErr
parameters.description: p/He ratio total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProHeRatio_StatErr
parameters.description: p/He ratio statistical error: p and He statistical errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProHeRatio_TimeErr
parameters.description: p/He ratio time-dependent error: p and He time-dependent errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: ProHeRatio_SystErr
parameters.description: p/He ratio systematic error: p and He systematic errors added in quadrature, with correlations in rigidity resolution, unfolding, absolute rigidity scale errors taken into account.

parameters.name: EleFlux
parameters.description: Electron differential flux, at 49 bins 1.01-49.3 GeV.

parameters.name: EleFlux_TotErr
parameters.description: Electron flux total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: EleFlux_StatErr
parameters.description: Electron flux statistical error.

parameters.name: EleFlux_SystErr
parameters.description: Electron flux systematic error: acceptance and background contamination errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: PosFlux
parameters.description: Positron differential flux, at 49 bins 1.01-49.3 GeV.

parameters.name: PosFlux_TotErr
parameters.description: Positron flux total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: PosFlux_StatErr
parameters.description: Positron flux statistical error.

parameters.name: PosFlux_SystErr
parameters.description: Positron flux systematic error: acceptance and background contamination errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: PosEleRatio
parameters.description: Positron to electron differential flux ratio, at 49 bins 1.01-49.3 GeV.

parameters.name: PosEleRatio_TotErr
parameters.description: e+/e- ratio total error: statistical and systematic added in quadrature.

parameters.name: PosEleRatio_StatErr
parameters.description: e+/e- ratio statistical error.

parameters.name: PosEleRatio_SystErr
parameters.description: e+/e- ratio systematic error: acceptance and background contamination errors added in quadrature.

parameters.name: DOSE
parameters.description: Average dose rate

parameters.name: DOSE_EQ60
parameters.description: Average Dose Equivalent Rate (ICRP-60)

parameters.name: TIME_INTERVAL
parameters.description: Number of minutes over which the data was collected

parameters.name: LONGITUDE
parameters.description: Geographic longitude of the International Space Station

parameters.name: LATITUDE
parameters.description: Geographic latitude of the International Space Station

parameters.name: ALTITUDE
parameters.description: Altitude of the International Space Station

parameters.name: Latitude
parameters.description: Latitude

parameters.name: Longitude
parameters.description: Longitude

parameters.name: Altitude
parameters.description: Altitude

parameters.name: T_e
parameters.description: Electron Temperature

parameters.name: N_i
parameters.description: Total Ion Density

parameters.name: Oxygen_Ion_Percent
parameters.description: Ratio of O+/Total Ion Density

parameters.name: Spacecraft_Potential
parameters.description: Spacecraft Potential

parameters.name: Spacecraft_Potential_Uncertainty
parameters.description: Spacecraft Potential Uncertainty

parameters.name: Sunlight
parameters.description: Sunlight Illuminiation

parameters.name: TCC
parameters.description: Time Code Flag
